00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_WRAPPER_COPY_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_WRAPPER_COPY_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <algorithm>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/call_traits.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_cv.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/framework.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/base.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/crtp.hpp>
00019 
00020 namespace boost{
00021 namespace assign{ 
00022 namespace v2{
00023 namespace ref{
00024 namespace assign_tag{ struct copy{}; }
00025 namespace assign_copy{ typedef assign_tag::copy assign_tag_; }
00026 
00027     template< class T >
00028     struct wrapper<ref::assign_tag::copy, T> 
00029     : 
00030         public ref::wrapper_crtp< wrapper<ref::assign_tag::copy, T>, T>
00031     {
00032         BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_WRAPPER_BASE( wrapper )     
00033 
00034         typedef ref::assign_tag::copy assign_tag;
00035 
00036         void assign(typename boost::call_traits<T>::param_type r )
00037         {
00038             this->unwrap() = r;
00039         }
00040 
00041         void swap( wrapper& r )
00042         {
00043             std::swap( this->unwrap(), r.unwrap() );
00044         }
00045 
00046     };
00047     
00048 namespace type_traits{
00049     
00050     template<typename T>
00051     struct copy_wrapper{ typedef ref::wrapper<assign_tag::copy,T> type; };
00052     
00053     template<typename T>
00054     struct does_assign_copy_impl : boost::mpl::false_{};
00055     
00056     template<typename T>
00057     struct does_assign_copy_impl<       
00058         ref::wrapper<assign_tag::copy, T> 
00059     > : boost::mpl::true_{};
00060     
00061     template<typename T>
00062     struct does_assign_copy : does_assign_copy_impl<
00063         typename boost::remove_cv<T>::type
00064     >{};
00065     
00066 }// type_traits
00067 }// ref
00068 }// v2
00069 }// assign
00070 }// boost
00071 
00072 #endif
